extracted-table.table-caption: Peak MNI coordinates for regions showing significant correlations between ACC-seeded FC and SDQ PB scores.

caption.p: Peak MNI coordinates for regions showing significant correlations between ACC-seeded FC and SDQ PB scores.

table-wrap-foot.p: Statistical thresholds were set at an uncorrected p < 0.005 (voxel level) and a family-wise error (FWE)-corrected p < 0.05 (cluster level).
Abbreviations: ACC, anterior cingulate cortex; FC, functional connectivity; SDQ, Strengths and Difficulties Questionnaire; PB, prosocial behavior; L, left; R, right.
